Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 80th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1972...
Injured on 5/6/1974 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Released by Lynchburg on 7/8/1977...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 9/12/1977 to a minor league deal...
Released by Halifax on 4/7/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/24/1982 to a 1-year deal worth $300,001 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/18/1984, off Scott Wiltshire (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/8/1985, off Stephen Paul (WIS)...
